UpdateProfileSchemaTexts.minLastName: Last name must be at least 2 characters

NutritionalFactSchemaTexts.totalGrams: Totals of fat, carbohydrates, protein and salt must add to 100 but is

fat.positive: Fat must be a positive number
fat.nonnegative: Fat must be a positive number
fat.max: Fat must be less or equal to 100

saturatedFat.positive: Saturated fat must be a positive number
saturatedFat.nonnegative: Saturated fat must be a positive number
saturatedFat.max: Saturated fat must be less than fat and less or equal to 100

carbohydrates.positive: Carbohydrates must be a positive number
carbohydrates.nonnegative: Carbohydrates must be a positive number
carbohydrates.max: Carbohydrates must be less or equal to 100

sugar.positive: Sugar must be a positive number
sugar.nonnegative: Sugar must be a positive number
sugar.max: Sugar must be less than carbohydrates and less or equal to 100

protein.positive: Protein must be a positive number
protein.nonnegative: Protein must be a positive number
protein.max: Protein must be less or equal to 100

salt.positive: Salt must be a positive number
salt.nonnegative: Salt must be a positive number
salt.max: Salt must be less or equal to 100

NutritionalFactSchemaTexts.refineSaturatedFat: Saturated fat must be less than fat
NutritionalFactSchemaTexts.refineSugar: Sugar must be less than carbohydrates
NutritionalFactSchemaTexts.atLeastOnePositive: At least one of fat, carbohydrates, protein and salt must be a positive number

RecipeSchemaTexts.minIngredients: At least one ingredient is required

PlanSchemaTexts.minDays: At least one day is required

CheckoutSchemaTexts.confirmPrice: The confirmed amount must exactly match the total price of {price, number, currency}

MealSchemaTexts.hourPeriod: Hour period must be between 0 and 23
MealSchemaTexts.minutePeriod: Minute period must be between 0 and 59
MealSchemaTexts.minRecipes: At least one recipe is required

AnswerFromBodySchemaTexts.minQuestion: The question must be at least 10 characters long

HomeHeaderTexts.title: Your path to a healthier life starts here !

HomeHeroTexts.title:
Bro Meets Science
the ultimate nutrition
HomeHeroTexts.description: Get access to the best nutritional plans, recipes, and posts written by professionals. Start your journey to a healthier life today and enjoy your body with Bro Meets Science.

HomeTestimonialsTexts.title: See What Our Customers Are Saying

testimonial1.quote: The nutritional insights and meal plans have completely transformed my diet. I feel more energetic and healthier than ever before.
testimonial1.name: Sarah Chen
testimonial1.pleasure: Passionate about jogging and exploring new trails

testimonial2.quote: The recipes are easy to follow, and the platform's flexibility has helped me stay consistent with my fitness goals.
testimonial2.name: Andrei Popescu
testimonial2.pleasure: Loves cooking and experimenting with new flavors

testimonial3.quote: Bro Meets Science has simplified my nutrition planning and introduced me to foods that are both delicious and beneficial for my lifestyle.
testimonial3.name: Marcus Johnson

testimonial4.quote: The detailed nutritional facts and expert advice have been a game-changer for my diet and overall well-being.
testimonial4.name: Jabbad Dutt

register.title: Register
register.description: Register to get access to all the features of our platform, and become a part of our community.

posts.title: Read Posts
posts.description: Read posts to gain knowledge and insights about different topics written by professionals.

plans.title: Buy Plans
plans.description: Buy plans to improve yourself and get the full experience of our platform. We offer a wide range of plans according to your needs.

HomeAboutTexts.title: Why to choose our platform?
HomeAboutTexts.content1: At Bro Meets Science, we bridge the gap between cutting-edge nutritional research and practical, everyday advice. Our team of certified nutritionists and fitness experts is dedicated to providing personalized nutritional plans that are not only effective but also sustainable. Unlike generic diet fads, our plans are rooted in scientific evidence and tailored to meet your unique health goals and lifestyle needs. We believe that proper nutrition is the cornerstone of a healthy life, and we're committed to empowering you with the knowledge and tools you need to make informed decisions about your diet and well-being.
HomeAboutTexts.content2: Our platform is more than just a place to buy nutritional plans; it's a community of like-minded individuals seeking to improve their health and fitness. Through our regularly updated blog, we share the latest insights in nutrition science, debunk common myths, and offer practical tips to help you stay on track. Whether you're looking to lose weight, build muscle, or simply adopt a healthier lifestyle, our content is designed to educate and inspire you every step of the way. We understand that the journey to optimal health is a personal one, and we're here to support you with expert advice and encouragement.
HomeAboutTexts.content3: Choosing Bro Meets Science means choosing a partner in your health journey. We pride ourselves on our transparent approach and are committed to providing you with reliable information and high-quality services. Our nutritional plans are customizable, ensuring they align with your specific dietary preferences and restrictions. Plus, with our user-friendly platform, accessing your plans and our wealth of blog content is seamless and convenient. Join us at Bro Meets Science and take the first step towards a healthier, happier youbacked by science and supported by a community that cares.

be-aware.title: Be aware
be-aware.text: Realize your problems and target them. Don't be afraid to make changes that make you uncomfortable.

be-afraid.title: Get comfortable with being afraid
be-afraid.text: It's normal to feel overwhelmed and insecure about getting started. Don't let these feelings stop you.

make-a-plan.title: Make a plan
make-a-plan.text: Plan ahead and be very structured. Make realistic targets and do things your way. Don't let others decide your journey.

step-by-step.title: Step by step
step-by-step.text: Be patient and know that life is a marathon, not a sprint. Don't seek quick fixes; be happy with every little progress.

work-hard.title: Work your ass off
work-hard.text: Working hard pays off. Every change requires sacrifices, so be prepared to make some. In the end, you'll thank yourself.

comfortable.title: Become comfortable with your new life
comfortable.text: Over time, everything you thought was too hard will become trivial. When this happens, pat yourself on the back and see your progress.

stay-consistent.title: Don't let the results slow you down
stay-consistent.text: Don't get too comfortable and think you can't lose what you've achieved. This is where the difference between the sprint and the marathon is made.

HomeMapTexts.title: No Boundaries
HomeMapTexts.subtitle: Break free from traditional boundaries. Be the best version of yourself anywhere anytime. Leave the excuses at home not the diet.

FooterTexts.title: Your path to a healthier life starts here
FooterTexts.rightsReserved: Bro Meets Science Co. All rights reserved.

terms1.title: EU REGULATIONS
terms1.body: These Terms And Conditions associated with the processing of personal data (hereinafter referred to as the Conditions) describe the way in which BMS Ltd., with its registered office at Roamnia, ID number 46 440 224, (hereinafter referred to as the `Company` or `we`) processes your personal data for the purpose of providing our services, consisting in the sale and distribution of nutritional supplements, sportswear and exercise accessories through an online store (hereinafter referred to as the `Services`).The company is responsible for the processing of personal data under Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council (EU) of 27 April 2016 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, repealing Directive 95/46 / EC [GDPR. `] and Act no. 18/2018 Coll. on the Protection of Personal Data and on Amendments to Certain Acts, as currently in force [hereinafter referred to as `Act no. 18/2018 Coll. `].The company has taken all appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the protection of personal data.`Personal data`: data relating to an identified natural person or an identifiable natural person which can be identified directly or indirectly, in particular by a generally applicable identifier, another identifier such as a name, surname, identification number, location data or an online identifier, or on the basis of one or more characteristics or traits that make up its physical identity, physiological identity, genetic identity, mental identity, economic identity, cultural identity or social identity.`Processing of personal data`: a processing operation or set of processing operations involving personal data or personal data files, in particular the acquisition, recording, organizing, structuring, storage, alteration, retrieval, browsing, exploitation, transmission, dissemination or otherwise, combining, restricting, deleting, whether performed by automated means or non-automated means.

terms2.title: ON THE BASIS OF WHAT CAN WE PROCESS YOUR PERSONAL DATA?
terms2.body: In addition to the above, we have the right to process your Personal Data to fulfil our legal obligations under Article 6, Sec 1, (c) of the GDPR or to protect our legitimate interests under Article 6 Sec (1), (f) of GDPR, for example for fraud prevention, network and information security and direct marketing.We will process your Personal Data in accordance with applicable law, and we will protect your Personal Data against misuse and / or illegal disclosure.

terms3.title: HOW DO WE SHARE YOUR PERSONAL DATA?
terms3.body: In order to make our Website and/or Services available (and if necessary due to circumstances) we have the right to provide your Personal Data (and you give consent to such provision) in accordance with the principle of minimization only to a limited circle of persons, our employees, subcontractors, officials, advisors, sales representatives, suppliers or related parties of the Company and the Service Provider to the extent that it is reasonable and necessary to achieve the purpose set out in these Terms&Conditions, in particular the following entities:(i) Global Payments Ltd., organizational file, with its registered office at Bucharest Romanian Bd. Iuliu Maniu 51B, Company Identification Number: 50 010 301.(ii) Meta Platforms Ireland Limited, 4 Grand Canal Square, Grand Canal Harbour, Dublin, D02X525, Ireland(iii) Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland(iv) TikTok Inc., Culver City,Bristol Pkwy 5800, United States

terms4.title: DO WE TRANSFER YOUR PERSONAL DATA TO THIRD COUNTRIES?
terms4.body: The personal data we collect may be stored or otherwise processed and transmitted within the countries in which we conduct our business activities to achieve the purpose of the processing set forth in these Terms. For the same purpose, your data may be transferred between the Member States of the European Union or the European Economic Area and countries which, according to the European Commission, guarantee the level of personal data protection as published from time to time by the Office.

terms5.title: HOW LONG WILL WE PROCESS YOUR PERSONAL DATA?
terms5.body: Unless otherwise provided in applicable law, we have the right to process your Personal Data in a form that allows you to identify yourself for the time necessary to achieve the purpose for which the Personal Data was provided (this may include the time you visit our Website or use our Services and / or for the entire period during which the purpose of processing Personal Data lasts).

LocaleLayout.title: Bro Meets Science
LocaleLayout.description: Bro Meets Science is a platform that offers a wide range of plans, recipes, and posts to help you improve your health and lifestyle. Join us and start your journey to a healthier life!
LocaleLayout.keywords: health, nutrition, recipes, plans, posts, lifestyle, fitness, diet, food, ingredients, platform, community, trainers, professionals,  journey, progress, improvement, life, experience, company, science, bro, meals, cooking, eating, habits, goals, achievements, success, motivation, inspiration, support, community, platform, company, trainers, professionals, knowledge, insights,  journey, progress, improvement, life, experience, company, science, bro, meals, cooking, eating, habits, goals, achievements, success, motivation, inspiration, support, community
